original_title: 真的，坏了 まじ、やばい
overview: POV horror inspired by the "Sealed Video" series. Shimauchi visits the "jack of all trades" Manabe to investigate his lover, Mayuko, who has been acting strange lately. When she starts secretly filming her surroundings with a freelance photographer, Tsuchida, something impossible is reflected...
tagline: Would you be willing to investigate my girlfriend?
title: Seriously, Seriously, Dangerous
